action.action-desc: Mr. Beyer (for himself, Ms. Chu, Mr. Carson, Mr. Evans of Pennsylvania, and Ms. McBride) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to allow participation in certain Fulbright programs to qualify for the repayment plan for public service employees, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Fulbright Teacher’s Loan Forgiveness Act.

section.header: Repayment plan for public service employees
section.text: Section 455(m) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1087e(m)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: For purposes of loan cancellation under this subsection, participation in a Fulbright Teacher Exchange Program or the Fulbright English Teaching Assistant Program shall be treated as employment in a public service job.
